articles.description: The rocker, 79, has become the latest artist to sell their entire music collection in a deal with Sony Music Publishing.
articles.content:
Paul Simon has become the latest artist to sell their entire music collection in a deal with Sony Music Publishing.
The 79-year-old rocker's deal covers over six decades worth of music from Simon &a… [+3208 chars]
